moves.name: Zen Headbutt
moves.effect: Has a chance (20%) of making the target flinch.

moves.name: X Speed
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Hang in There!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense and Sp. Def by 1 stat rank. Applies the Gradual Healing effect to the user.

passives.name: Foul Fighting 1
passives.description: Powers up the user’s moves when the move’s target or targets are flinching, confused, or trapped.

passives.name: Aggravation 2
passives.description: Raises the chance of inflicting the flinching, confused, or trapped condition with the additional effects of moves.
